alert.note: Alert for Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marion, west central Fulton and Baxter Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 444 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mountain Home, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mountain Home... Bull Shoals... Gassville... Lakeview in Baxter County... Salesville... Briarcliff... Arkawana... Diamond Bay... Ozark Regional Airport... Gamaliel Landing... Ozark Isle... Fawn Park... Bull Shoals State Park... Shipp... Colfax... Cartney... Price Place... Norfork Dam... Cotter... Midway in Baxter County... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
